Package com.cratediggers.service

Class ReviewServices

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.service.ReviewServices
public class ReviewServices
extends java.lang.Object
Handles all business logic for the review module. Follows model-view-controller design architecture by ensuring that the model and view never interact directly.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request
    Contains parameters received by a HTTP request.
    private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response
    Used to store attributes that are utilised for JSP generation.
    private ReviewDAO reviewDAO
    ReviewDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).

  • Field Details

    • reviewDAO

      private ReviewDAO reviewDAO
      ReviewDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).

    • request

      Contains parameters received by a HTTP request.

    • response

      private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response
      Used to store attributes that are utilised for JSP generation.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewServices

      public ReviewServices​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Constructs an ReviewServices object containing the request and response objects provided by a servlet. Constructs a new reviewDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).
      Parameters:
      request - object that contains parameters received in HTTP request made to the server.
      response - object that is used to store attributes which are utilised for JSP generation.

  • Method Details

    • listAllReview

      public void listAllReview() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Provides polymorphism so that listAllReview(String message) can be called without a specified message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • listAllReview

      public void listAllReview​(java.lang.String message) throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves a list of all reviews from database. Forwards the list and a specified message onto "review_list.jsp" to display to users.
      Parameters:
      message - to be displayed at top of JSP page
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • editReview

      public void editReview() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains review object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. If review exists then display "review_form.jsp" in the view, setting the review object as an attribute in the response object so that pre-existing review object information can auto-fill in form fields. If review does not exist then displays error message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • updateReview

      public void updateReview() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves reviewId, headline and comment parameter from request object. Finds the review object that contains the specified reviewId. Modifies the object by setting the new values of headline and comment and updates the corresponding record in the database (the model).
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • deleteReview

      public void deleteReview() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains review object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. If this review does not exist then an error message is generated and displayed to the user in the view. Otherwise, the corresponding record is deleted in the database (the model) and the user informed by a message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • showReviewForm

      public void showReviewForm() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains album object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. Sets this album as a session attribute and retrieves the currently logged in customer from session. Searches database for a review that already contain the specified albumId and the customerId of the current customer. If such a review exists then display that review to the customer in view, since a customer can only create one review per album. Otherwise, display "review_form.jsp" to customer.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • submitReview

      public void submitReview() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves all parameters from request object and creates new review object. Obtains and sets corresponding album object by albumId and customer object from session. ReviewDAO creates the record in the database (the model) and displays list of all reviews in view.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException
